info.name: Cortex Analyst API
info.description:
The Snowflake Cortex Analyst API is a REST API that allows end user to chat with their data leveraging semantic models to generate SQL queries.

Contact Support:
 Name: Snowflake, Inc.
 Email: support@snowflake.com

request.description: Send a user feedback of Cortex Analyst response

response.name: Successful request.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Forbidden. The request is forbidden. This can also happen if the request is made even if the API is not enabled.

response.name: Not Found. The request endpoint is not valid. This happens if the API endpoint does not exist, or if the API is not enabled.

response.name: Method Not Allowed. The request method doesn't match the supported API. This happens, for example, if the application calls the API with GET method but the endpoint accepts only POST.

response.name: Limit Exceeded. The number of requests hit the rate limit. The application must slow down the frequency of hitting the API endpoints.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

description.content: Unique ID of the API request.

response.name: Internal Server Error. The server hit an unrecoverable system error. The response body may include the error code and message for further guidance. The application owner may need to reach out the customer support.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

description.content: Unique ID of the API request.

response.name: Service Unavailable. The request was not processed due to server side timeouts. The application may retry with backoff. The jittered backoff is recommended.

description.content: Unique ID of the API request.

response.name: Gateway Timeout. The request was not processed due to server side timeouts. The application may retry with backoff. The jittered backoff is recommended.
